mean_cn: n. 下层阶级，下层社会，一、二年级学生
mean_en: a social class made up of people who are very poor and have very little power or chance to improve their lives :the lowest social class
sentence: The underclass often have poor living conditions and live a difficult life.
sentence_trans: 下层阶级的人民通常来说生活环境糟糕且生活艰辛。
